Well, you tell us. :) My guess is that since the Frontier couldn't  
proceed, then its notions of what should or shouldn't be in the  
queues agreed with the restored crawl job dir, and so no further work  
on your part would be required. Did your crawl complete successfully?

-Paul

> I discovered the source of the problem. A Colleague mistankenly  
> moved the original crawl job dir to another location. I moved it  
> back and resumed the crawl. All appears OK. Should I have restarted  
> the crawl in a different manner - using recover.gz - or should this  
> be fine.
>
> Mike
>
>
> On 7/25/07, mjjjhjemj <bosoxchamps@...> wrote:
> 1) What do these errors mean?
> 2) Can I recover the crawl and start of where it last left off?
